thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Synacor Q1 Loss Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Synacor Q1 Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Synacor Inc:
* SYNACOR DELIVERS 24% YOY REVENUE GROWTH IN FIRST QUARTER 2018
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $33 MILLION TO $35 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $32.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $31.2 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY EXPECTS TO REPORT 2018 A NET LOSS IN RANGE OF $4.4 MILLION TO $8.6 MILLION
* EXPECTS TO REPORT A Q2 NET LOSS OF $1.8 MILLION TO $2.9 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.17, REVENUE VIEW $152.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $34.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
